title: I got chat restricted and I don't understand why?
body:
I got chat restricted and I don't know why because typically I rarely type in game, so I would like a rioter to confirm this or if this is just a result of the instant  feedback pile of garbage

EDIT: So I didn't get chat logs from riot. However everyone is telling me to fuck off for that so yeah. Man what a great community. don't worry, I won't ever post here again asking for help, I am a complete idiot for even asking

replies.body: Can you post your chat logs? It will be easier to help you then.
All chat restrictions come from the instant feedback system, so there isn't anything for Riot to confirm. Login and read the chatlog popup.

You got chat logs you are just to ashamed to post them because you know exactly why you got chat restricted.

You can't not get them they are thrown right at your face in game on the client screen the moment it happens.

If you are as innocent as you say though send in a ticket and request them, then post them here.
If you can't find your chat logs in the client or in your email/spam folder then file a Support Ticket asking for them.
